predicate.note: Frames file for 'commercialize' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: transitive
example.text: Many of the deals involved transactions in which scientific institutions or researchers agreed [*-2] to commercialize their work in return for an equity stake or royalties [*T*-1] .

example.name: with instrument
example.text: Proceeds will be used [*-1] [*-2] to commercialize recently patented technology and support the company 's international expansion .
